item.description:
Organic Vegan Thanksgiving Feast: 43 Gifford Lane, Concord MA 01742
10:30am-2:30pm cooking and setting up; 2:30pm-3:30pm feasting; 3:30pm-7pm games and clean up; 7pm Dessert!
Menu Includes:
Kamut Bread Centerpiece*
Roast Seitan*
Vegan Duck*
Sage, Leek, Barley Dressing*
Mashed Potatoes*
Gravy*
Coconut Butternut Squash Soup*
Steamed Yams*
Cranberry Sauce*
Calabacitas*
Italian Roasted Potatoes*
Broccoli with Garlic*
Green Peas with minced Onion*
Green Salad with Edible Flowers, vinaigrette and toasted nuts*
Vegan Eggnog*
Pumpkin Pie*
Pecan Pie*
Pure Decadence Vanilla Bean Ice Cream*
Martinelli's Sparkling Cider*
Knudsens Sparkling Cherry Juice*
Knudsens Sparkling Pear Juice*
* indicate that someone is bringing the dish. Please coordinate with Dushenka at 978-369-1459 what you will bring and whether you will come early and stay late or be there just for sit down meal at 2pm.
item.name: It's that time of year! Vegan Thanksgiving Feast!!!!
